resources.string: Don\'t worry, as an Asset Issuer you are able to create them using the Asset Factory. All the assets you published there, will be stored at this wallet.
Don\'t worry, as an Asset User you are able to receive assets from many Asset Owners. You are already eligible to receive them and store them at this wallet.

Don\'t worry, as a redeem point you need to connect your device to other Assets Issuers using the Asset Issuer Community application. Once you are connected, you will be eligible to redeem assets from any user!
